name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy SMALLEY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy SMALLEY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence and Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John Paul Curran, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Marianne E. Cox, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 740
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leroy SMALLEY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 30, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
John Paul Curran, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Marianne E. Cox, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
